6 template <>
7 bool isSameVoxel(const TsdfVoxel& voxel_A, const TsdfVoxel& voxel_B) {
8  bool is_the_same = true;
9 
10  constexpr double kTolerance = 1e-10;
11 
12  is_the_same &= std::abs(voxel_A.distance - voxel_B.distance) < kTolerance;
13  is_the_same &= std::abs(voxel_A.weight - voxel_B.weight) < kTolerance;
14  is_the_same &= voxel_A.color.r == voxel_B.color.r;
15  is_the_same &= voxel_A.color.g == voxel_B.color.g;
16  is_the_same &= voxel_A.color.b == voxel_B.color.b;
17  is_the_same &= voxel_A.color.a == voxel_B.color.a;
18 
19  return is_the_same;
20 }
21 
22 template <>
23 bool isSameVoxel(const EsdfVoxel& voxel_A, const EsdfVoxel& voxel_B) {
24  bool is_the_same = true;
25 
26  constexpr double kTolerance = 1e-10;
27 
28  is_the_same &= std::abs(voxel_A.distance - voxel_B.distance) < kTolerance;
29  is_the_same &= voxel_A.observed == voxel_B.observed;
30  is_the_same &= voxel_A.in_queue == voxel_B.in_queue;
31  is_the_same &= voxel_A.fixed == voxel_B.fixed;
32 
33  is_the_same &= voxel_A.parent.x() == voxel_B.parent.x();
34  is_the_same &= voxel_A.parent.y() == voxel_B.parent.y();
35  is_the_same &= voxel_A.parent.z() == voxel_B.parent.z();
36 
37  return is_the_same;
38 }
39 
40 template <>
41 bool isSameVoxel(const OccupancyVoxel& voxel_A, const OccupancyVoxel& voxel_B) {
42  bool is_the_same = true;
43 
44  constexpr double kTolerance = 1e-10;
45 
46  is_the_same &=
47  std::abs(voxel_A.probability_log - voxel_B.probability_log) < kTolerance;
48  is_the_same &= voxel_A.observed == voxel_B.observed;
49 
50  return is_the_same;
51 }
